title: grouping
description:
A Grouping is a set of references to STIX context that the object
creator wishes to treat as a distinct entity with shared context.

type.description: The type of this object, which MUST be the literal `x-oasis-cti-tc-grouping`.

name.description: A name used to identify the Grouping.

description.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Grouping, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics.

context.description: A description that provides more details and context about the Grouping, potentially including its purpose and its key characteristics. This is an open vocabulary and values **SHOULD** come from the `grouping-context-ov` vocabulary.

object_refs.description: Specifies the STIX Objects that are referred to by this Grouping.
